title: paNindEn kandA
sahitya:
paNindEn kandA un pAdAravindam iNaiyillA adan tuNai peravE nAn


anupallavi

  aNaiyum karam unakku AriraNDirundAlum ati viraivil padamE gati tarum ena nAn


caraNam    kandA enakkadari cendUril unait-tEDi vandOrkk-abhayam tandATkoLvOnE
cintai kanindanru sIrizhanda dEvarai sirai mITTup-pEraruL purindu sirandOnE
